item.title: Russia-Ukraine Discussion On Agenda As PM Modi, Joe Biden Hold Talks
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit here and the two leaders were expected to discuss a range of issues, including the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

item.title: French President Macron Announces New Government Led By PM Michel Barnier
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron named a new government led by Prime Minister Michel Barnier Saturday, his office said, marked by a shift to the right 11 weeks after an inconclusive parliamentary election.

item.title: Kamala Harris Challenges Donald Trump To Another Debate Ahead Of Elections
item.description: Kamala Harris on Saturday challenged Donald Trump to another debate in the lead-up to the US presidential election, with her campaign saying she had accepted an invitation from broadcaster CNN to host the event on October 23.

item.title: PM Modi, Joe Biden Hold India-US Bilateral Talks, Quad Leaders' Meet Next
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, who arrived in the United States earlier today for his three-day official visit, is currently holding bilateral talks with US President Joe Biden. They will then attend the strategic Quad summit later today.

item.title: Joe Biden Welcomes PM Modi With A Hug, India-US Bilateral Talks Begin
item.description: PM Modi in US Live Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today left for his three-day US Visit. The Prime Minister will attend the Quad summit and will hold bilateral talks with US President Joe Biden.

item.title: Macron Appoints Cabinet as He Seeks to Move France Out of Political Impasse
item.description: The government still faces two challenges in the coming weeks: the risk of a no-confidence vote and a tight budget deadline.

item.title: Russia pushes sex-at-work scheme as population crisis escalates
